description:
Are you a talented Junior Associate Attorney looking for a new opportunity in Los Angeles, CA? Our office is currently seeking a dynamic individual with 1-3 years of experience to join our team. The role will involve working on diverse caseloads focusing on Professional Liability and Securities/FINRA. To excel in this position, you must have CA bar admission and possess strong writing and analytical skills. The salary for this role is competitive and ranges from $90,000.00 to $120,000.00. This position offers a hybrid schedule, providing flexibility and work-life balance.

  • Position: Junior Associate Attorney: Location: Los Angeles, CA
  • Experience: 1-3 years
  • Practice areas: Professional Liability, Securities/FINRA
  • Requirements: CA bar admission
  • Skills: Strong writing and analytical skills
  • Salary range: $90,000.00-$120,000.00
  • Schedule: Hybrid

Compensation: $90,000 - $120,000
